trans-unit.resname: YMID·1 | Angel of Eternal Dawn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Eternal Dawn
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·1 | Angel of Eternal Dawn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When Angel of Eternal Dawn enters the battlefield, it becomes day. It can't become night. Your opponents can't cast spells with mana value greater than the number of turns they have begun.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·2 | Angel of Unity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Unity
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·2 | Angel of Unity | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink Whenever Angel of Unity enters the battlefield or you cast a party spell, choose a party creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +1/+1. (A party card or spell is a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard.)
Captain Eberhart
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Double strike Spells cast from among cards you drew this turn cost {1} less to cast. Spells cast from among cards your opponents drew this turn cost {1} more to cast.
Divine Purge
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Exile all artifacts and creatures with mana value 3 or less. They perpetually gain "This spell costs {2} more to cast" and "This permanent enters the battlefield tapped." For as long as each of them remain exiled, its owner may play it.
Ethereal Escort
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Lifelink Whenever Ethereal Escort enters the battlefield or attacks, choose a card in your hand. It perpetually gains lifelink.
Expedition Supplier
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever Expedition Supplier or another Human enters the battlefield under your control, conjure a card named Utility Knife onto the battlefield. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Faithful Disciple
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Vigilance When Faithful Disciple dies, draft a card from Faithful Disciple's spellbook.
Inquisitor Captain
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Vigilance When Inquisitor Captain enters the battlefield, if there are twenty or more creature cards with mana value 3 or less among cards in your graveyard, hand, and library, seek two creature cards with mana value 3 or less. Put one of them onto the battlefield and shuffle the other into your library.
Sigardian Evangel
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Sigardian Evangel enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Sigardian Evangel into your hand. Discard that card at the beginning of the next end step. When Sigardian Evangel enters the battlefield, tap target permanent you don't control.
Slayer's Bounty
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Slayer's Bounty enters the battlefield, look at the creature cards in target opponent's hand. Whenever you sacrifice Slayer's Bounty or another Clue, draft a card from Slayer's Bounty's spellbook. {2}, Sacrifice Slayer's Bounty: Draw a card.
Suntail Squadron
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Conjure a card named Suntail Hawk into your hand. If you have fewer than seven cards in hand, repeat this process.
Absorb Energy
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Cards in your hand that share a card type with that spell perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast."
Unexpected Conversion
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. Then you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your hand. If you do, search your hand and library for any number of cards with the same name, exile them, then shuffle. Seek an instant or sorcery card for each card exiled from your hand this way.
Clone Crafter
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Clone Crafter enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of a random creature card from your opponent's library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

trans-unit.resname: YMID·15 | Discover the Formula | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Discover the Formula
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·15 | Discover the Formula | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Seek three nonland cards, then nonland cards in your hand perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

trans-unit.resname: YMID·16 | Geist of Regret | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Geist of Regret
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·16 | Geist of Regret | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When Geist of Regret enters the battlefield, put a random instant card from your library into your graveyard. Then put a random sorcery card from your library into your graveyard. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Geistchanneler
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Geistchanneler enters the battlefield, choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand with mana value 3 or greater. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} less to cast."
Kindred Denial
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Seek a card with the same mana value as that spell.
Obsessive Collector
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {2} Whenever Obsessive Collector deals combat damage to a player, seek a card with mana value equal to the number of cards in your hand.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·20 | Oglor, Devoted Assistant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oglor, Devoted Assistant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·20 | Oglor, Devoted Assistant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library, then put one of them into your graveyard. Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from your library or hand, it perpetually gains "When this card leaves your graveyard, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token."
Rimewall Protector
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Ward {1} When Rimewall Protector enters the battlefield, each other Giant or Wizard you control and each Giant or Wizard card in your hand perpetually gains ward {1}.
Sinister Reflections
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Conjure a duplicate of each of up to two target nontoken creatures you control into your hand.
Tireless Angler
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever an Island enters the battlefield under your control, draft a card from Tireless Angler's spellbook.
Cursebound Witch
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Cursebound Witch dies, draft a card from Cursebound Witch's spellbook.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·25 | Assemble from Parts | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assemble from Parts
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·25 | Assemble from Parts | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "{3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Shuffle it into your library. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery."
Break Expectations
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals all cards with mana value 2 or greater in their hand. You choose a card from among those cards. Exile that card. If a card was exiled this way, that player drafts a card from Break Expectations's spellbook and reveals it.
Citystalker Connoisseur
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch When Citystalker Connoisseur enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card with the greatest mana value among cards in their hand. Create a Blood token.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·28 | Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·28 | Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch Whenever Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant enters the battlefield, each player discards a nonland card. Whenever a player discards a card during your turn, they choose another player. That player conjures a duplicate of that card into their hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."
Patient Zero
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Lifelink Damage isn't removed from creatures your opponents control during cleanup steps.
Predatory Sludge
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Menace As Predatory Sludge enters the battlefield, choose a permanent you don't control. When the chosen permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, conjure a card named Predatory Sludge into your hand.
Puppet Raiser
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, seek a creature card with mana value equal to the mana value of that card plus one. That card perpetually gains menace.
Sanguine Brushstroke
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Sanguine Brushstroke enters the battlefield, create a Blood token and conjure a card named Blood Artist onto the battlefield. Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sap Vitality
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Sap Vitality deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +3/+0.
Veteran Ghoulcaller
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Menace Whenever a card in your graveyard is put into your hand, conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand.
Arms Scavenger
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, draft a card from Arms Scavenger's spellbook, then exile it. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
Bloodrage Alpha
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Bloodrage Alpha enters the battlefield, choose one — • Another target Wolf or Werewolf you control fights target creature you don't control. • When you cast your next Wolf or Werewolf spell, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control."
Brittle Blast
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Creatures and planeswalkers your opponents control perpetually gain "If this permanent would die, exile it instead." Brittle Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Conductive Current
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Conductive Current deals 3 damage to each creature. Choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand. It perpetually gains "If this spell would deal noncombat damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead."
Electrostatic Blast
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Electrostatic Blast deals 2 damage to any target. When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play one of those cards until end of turn.
Fearsome Whelp
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying At the beginning of your end step, each Dragon card in your hand perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."
Frenzied Geistblaster
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Prowess When Frenzied Geistblaster enters the battlefield, if there are twenty or more instant and/or sorcery cards among cards in your graveyard, hand, and library, you may discard a card. If you do, seek an instant or sorcery card.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·42 | Rahilda, Wanted Cutthroat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rahilda, Wanted Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 遭缉割喉客拉希妲 // 野性狂徒拉希妲
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·42 | Rahilda, Wanted Cutthroat | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike When Rahilda, Wanted Cutthroat deals combat damage to a player, exile a nonland card from their library at random. During any turn you attacked with a Wolf or Werewolf, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell. Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)

trans-unit.resname: YMID·42 | Rahilda, Feral Outlaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rahilda, Feral Outlaw
trans-unit.target: 遭缉割喉客拉希妲 // 野性狂徒拉希妲
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·42 | Rahilda, Feral Outlaw | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Double strike When Rahilda, Feral Outlaw deals combat damage to a player, exile a nonland card from their library at random. During any turn you attacked with a Wolf or Werewolf, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell. Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)

trans-unit.resname: YMID·43 | Tibalt, Wicked Tormentor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tibalt, Wicked Tormentor
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·43 | Tibalt, Wicked Tormentor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Add {R}{R}. Draft a card from Tibalt, Wicked Tormentor's spellbook, then exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card. +1: Tibalt, Wicked Tormentor deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker unless its controller has Tibalt deal 3 damage to them. If they do, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. −X: Create X 1/1 red Devil creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
Toralf's Disciple
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Haste Whenever Toralf's Disciple attacks, conjure four cards named Lightning Bolt into your library, then shuffle.
Town-Razer Tyrant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying When Town-Razer Tyrant enters the battlefield, target land you don't control loses all abilities except mana abilities and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, this permanent deals 2 damage to you unless you sacrifice it."
Antique Collector
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Antique Collector can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. When Antique Collector enters the battlefield, creatures you control perpetually gain "When this creature dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library if it's in your graveyard. If you do, investigate." (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

trans-unit.resname: YMID·47 | Garruk, Wrath of the Wilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Garruk, Wrath of the Wilds
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·47 | Garruk, Wrath of the Wilds | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +1/+1 and perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast." −1: Draft a card from Garruk, Wrath of the Wilds's spellbook and put it onto the battlefield. −5: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample.
Geistpack Alpha
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Trample When Geistpack Alpha dies, seek a permanent card with mana value equal to the number of lands you control.
Grizzled Huntmaster
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Grizzled Huntmaster enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand. If you do, search your hand and library for any number of cards with the same name, exile them, then shuffle. Choose a creature card you own from outside the game. Conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand for each card exiled from your hand this way.
Hinterland Chef
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Hinterland Chef enters the battlefield, draft a card from Hinterland Chef's spellbook. It perpetually becomes a Food artifact in addition to its other types and perpetually gains "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life."
Hollowhenge Wrangler
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Hollowhenge Wrangler enters the battlefield, seek a land card. Discard a land card: Conjure a card named Hollowhenge Beast into your hand. You may also activate this ability while Hollowhenge Wrangler is in your graveyard.
Ishkanah, Broodmother
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Reach Other Spiders you control get +1/+2. {1}{BG}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Draft a card from Ishkanah, Broodmother's spellbook.
Lupine Harbingers
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Trample, haste Lupine Harbingers enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of turns you've begun since it was foretold. Foretell {4}{G}{G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
Ravenous Pursuit
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +X/+X, where X is the amount of excess damage dealt this way.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·55 | Settle the Wilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Settle the Wilds
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·55 | Settle the Wilds | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Seek a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then seek a permanent card with mana value equal to the number of lands you control.
Tenacious Pup
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Tenacious Pup enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter, trample counter, and vigilance counter on it.
Begin Anew
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. Creature cards in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.

trans-unit.resname: YMID·58 | Gitrog, Horror of Zhava | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gitrog, Horror of Zhava
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·58 | Gitrog, Horror of Zhava | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Menace At the beginning of each combat, if Gitrog, Horror of Zhava is untapped, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If they do, tap Gitrog, Horror of Zhava, then seek a land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, it perpetually gains "{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Draw a card."

trans-unit.resname: YMID·59 | Key to the Archive | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Key to the Archive
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YMID·59 | Key to the Archive | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Key to the Archive enters the battlefield tapped. When Key to the Archive enters the battlefield, draft a card from Key to the Archive's spellbook, then discard a card. {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
Soulstealer Axe
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Wickerwing Effigy
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Defender You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast creature spells from the top of your library. Whenever you cast a creature spell from your library, it becomes a black Bird in addition to its other colors and types, has flying, and has base power and toughness 1/1.
Ominous Traveler
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Ominous Traveler enters the battlefield, draft a card from Ominous Traveler's spellbook. That card perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell" and "When you cast this spell, return a creature named Ominous Traveler you control to its owner's hand."
Forsaken Crossroads
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped. As Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield, choose a color. When Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield, scry 1. If you weren't the starting player, you may untap Forsaken Crossroads instead. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
